title: Exploratory Design Engineering Program Manager
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.
description:
- Partner with cross-functional teams including Software/Firmware and Hardware Engineering to deliver state-of-the-art technologies
- Define the program plan/schedule and manage program execution
- Deliver communication/presentations and drive the decision-making process
- Ensure tight inter-team coordination and communication
- Effectively and consistently communicate overall program status
- Identify and resolve conflicts, inter-dependencies and program issues quickly and efficiently
- Improve the system: Look for patterns, offer best practices and implement change
- Limited domestic or international travel may be required
preferred_qualifications:
Advanced engineering degree
Engineering / technical background, such as Electrical Engineering or Mechanical Engineering
Excellent communication and organizational skills with attention to detail
Ability to filter and distill relevant information for the right audience and is data driven
Self-motivated and hard-working with demonstrated creative and critical thinking capabilities
Proven ability to fit in well with a team, understand others’ capabilities and priorities while fostering a collaborative environment, and inspire team members
Understands and deals well with rapid development cycles; remains flexible and calm in the face of uncertainty
pay_benefits:
